title: Espresso Ratio Calculator
description: Dial in your espresso by calculating brew ratio, evaluating extraction time, and getting taste predictions with adjustment recommendations. Enter your dose, yield, and shot time to find the perfect balance.
formula: ratio = target_yield / dose. Ideal range: 1:1.5 (ristretto) to 1:3 (lungo). Time window: 24-30s for standard espresso. If time < 22s and ratio > 2, extraction is under (sour). If time > 32s and ratio < 1.8, extraction is over (bitter). Balanced zone: ratio 1.8-2.5 with time 24-30s.
output_format: Brew ratio displayed as 1:X, time-in-range boolean, taste prediction (under-extracted / over-extracted / balanced), and a specific adjustment recommendation (grind finer/coarser, adjust dose, change yield).
